qas.question: Where did Craig go to deal with his injury?
When did Craig go back to work?
In what city did Daniel Craig have minor surgery to repair his knee?
Who was flown to New Mexico to undergo minor surgery?
Craig underwent major surgery in what city?
Filming was affected by whose surgery?
Who underwent minor surgery to fix his arm?
Who returned to filming on 12 April?

context: Following filming in Mexico, and during a scheduled break, <b3_0><b5_0><b6_0><b7_0>Craig<b7_0/><b6_0/><b5_0/><b3_0/> was flown to <a0_0><a2_0><b4_0>New York<b4_0/><a2_0/><a0_0/> to undergo minor surgery to fix his knee injury. It was reported that filming was not affected and he had returned to filming at Pinewood Studios as planned on <a1_0>22 April<a1_0/>.
